comment: Number of pt bins is #ptedges - 1. Therefore #rebins = #ptedges -1

output.mass: #it{E}/#it{p} ratio for electrons; matched cluster p_{T} (GeV/#it{c}); #it{E}/#it{p} ratio; electrons
output.width: #it{E}/#it{p} ratio width ; matched cluster p_{T}; #sigma_{#it{E}/#it{p}}; electrons
output.chi2: #chi^{2} / N_{dof} for #it{E}/#it{p} ratio; p_{T} (GeV/#it{c}); #chi^{2} / N_{dof}; electrons
output.nmesons: Number of electrons in each p_{T} bin; p_{T} (GeV/#it{c}); #frac{dN}{dp_{T}}; electrons
output.spectrum: Number of electrons in each p_{T} bin; p_{T} (GeV/#it{c}); #frac{dN}{dp_{T}}; electrons
